definitions.definition: To modify (an object) from its original condition, typically to individualize and/or enhance the performance of the object.
examples: His friends were particularly impressed with the way he modded his Ruckus .

definitions.definition: To install or create a mod.
examples: Learning Java is what got me into modding Minecraft .

definitions.definition: To moderate; to silence or punish (a rule-breaking user) on a forum , especially when done by a moderator .
examples: Don't break the rules or you'll be modded .
I used to mod that forum.

main_definition: ( transitive , informal ) To modify (an object) from its original condition, typically to individualize and/or enhance the performance of the object.
secondary_definitions: ( video games ) To install or create a mod.
( transitive , Internet , informal ) To moderate; to silence or punish (a rule-breaking user) on a forum , especially when done by a moderator .
